title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.8 - Fees and charges in connection with a state aid grant or housing finance agency mortgage loan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.8 - Fees and charges in connection with a state aid grant or housing finance agency mortgage loan

State Regulations

All fees and charges associated with the acquisition of a

State aid grant or Housing Finance Agency mortgage loan shall be at a rate
determined by the Office of Mental Health and Housing Finance Agency. All fees
and charges associated with the acquisition and operation of the Facilities

Development Corporation mortgage loan program shall be at a rate determined by
the Office of Mental Health and approved by the Director of the Division of the

Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
521.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
